code:
export const homeObjectOne = {
  id: 'practice',
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'Our Practice',
  headline: 'The Law Offices of Rolando L. Rios',
  description: 'The Firm is dedicated to providing clients with professional, knowledgeable and attentive legal, counseling, and legislative services. The Firm centers its practice in the areas of federal and state civil litigation, including administrative, civil rights, constitutional, election, environmental justice, immigration, municipal, non-profit, public interest, school and water law and legislative consulting and litigation.',
  buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
  imgStart: false,
  img: require('../../images/books.jpg').default,
  alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
  dark: true,
  primary: true,
  darkText: false
};
export const homeObjectTwo = {
  id: 'voting-rights',
  lightBg: true,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'Voting Rights',
  headline: 'Is your Right to Vote being violated every time you vote?',
  description: 'It might be! Most people think that by casting a vote their voting right is protected; however, in reality the effectiveness of your vote depends on what election system is used in your community: wards, single member districts, at large voting, etc.  All these different systems can debase or dilute your vote. Diluting your vote is in violation of the law.',
  buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
  imgStart: true,
  img: require('../../images/voting.jpg').default,
  alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
  dark: true,
  primary: false,
  darkText: false
};
export const homeObjectThree = {
  id: 'firm',
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'The Firm',
  headline: 'The Firm is dedicated to providing clients with professional, knowledgeable and attentive legal, counseling, and legislative services.',
  description: 'The Firm centers its practice in the areas of federal and state civil litigation, specializing in immigration, voting, election, municipal, public interest, water and tort law. The attorneys of the Firm have been counsel of record in numerous trials in both federal and state courts. The Firm has argued before Texas courts and United States District Courts, Courts of Appeals and the Supreme Court. The attorneys are licensed to practice in both state and federal courts. Attorneys of the Firm are well-versed in the nuances and intricacies of the legal, judicial and legislative communities. The Firm takes pride in being able to understand complex issues and advocate on behalf of clients in the appropriate arenas. The Firm is constantly learning, changing and diversifying to better meet the need of clients. The Firm utilizes talent and technology to produce high-quality , yet cost-effective products and services for client. In addition, the Firm recognizes that, as a part of the Bexar and San Antonio communities, it has a duty to contribute to the good of the community. As such, the Firm promotes both service and scholarship.',
  buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
  imgStart: false,
  img: require('../../images/rlrpicture.jpg').default,
  alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
  dark: true,
  primary: true,
  darkText: false
};

sourcesContent:
export const homeObjectOne = {
    id: 'practice',
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Our Practice',
    headline: 'The Law Offices of Rolando L. Rios',
    description: 'The Firm is dedicated to providing clients with professional, knowledgeable and attentive legal, counseling, and legislative services. The Firm centers its practice in the areas of federal and state civil litigation, including administrative, civil rights, constitutional, election, environmental justice, immigration, municipal, non-profit, public interest, school and water law and legislative consulting and litigation.',
    buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
    imgStart: false,
    img: require('../../images/books.jpg').default,
    alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
    dark: true,
    primary: true,
    darkText: false,
}

export const homeObjectTwo = {
    id: 'voting-rights',
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Voting Rights',
    headline: 'Is your Right to Vote being violated every time you vote?',
    description: 'It might be! Most people think that by casting a vote their voting right is protected; however, in reality the effectiveness of your vote depends on what election system is used in your community: wards, single member districts, at large voting, etc.  All these different systems can debase or dilute your vote. Diluting your vote is in violation of the law.',
    buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
    imgStart: true,
    img: require('../../images/voting.jpg').default,
    alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
    dark: true,
    primary: false,
    darkText: false,
}

export const homeObjectThree = {
    id: 'firm',
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'The Firm',
    headline: 'The Firm is dedicated to providing clients with professional, knowledgeable and attentive legal, counseling, and legislative services.',
    description: 'The Firm centers its practice in the areas of federal and state civil litigation, specializing in immigration, voting, election, municipal, public interest, water and tort law. The attorneys of the Firm have been counsel of record in numerous trials in both federal and state courts. The Firm has argued before Texas courts and United States District Courts, Courts of Appeals and the Supreme Court. The attorneys are licensed to practice in both state and federal courts. Attorneys of the Firm are well-versed in the nuances and intricacies of the legal, judicial and legislative communities. The Firm takes pride in being able to understand complex issues and advocate on behalf of clients in the appropriate arenas. The Firm is constantly learning, changing and diversifying to better meet the need of clients. The Firm utilizes talent and technology to produce high-quality , yet cost-effective products and services for client. In addition, the Firm recognizes that, as a part of the Bexar and San Antonio communities, it has a duty to contribute to the good of the community. As such, the Firm promotes both service and scholarship.',
    buttonLabel: 'Learn More',
    imgStart: false,
    img: require('../../images/rlrpicture.jpg').default,
    alt: 'Rolando Rios Law',
    dark: true,
    primary: true,
    darkText: false,
}
